exampleEn: We must take the client's complaint seriously.
exampleKo: 우리는 고객의 불만 사항을 진지하게 받아들여야 합니다.

exampleEn: A moderator will facilitate the panel discussion.
The organization prohibits soliciting donations.
exampleKo: 그 단체는 기부 금을 요청하는 것(간청하는 것)을 금지합니다.

exampleEn: We maintain strong commercial relations with them.
exampleKo: 우리는 그들과 강력한 통상 관계를 유지하고 있습니다.

exampleEn: It is no wonder that the policy was rejected.
He refused to relinquish his position.
Mediation helped resolve the labor dispute.
exampleKo: 중재는 노사 분쟁을 해결하는 데 도움이 되었습니다.

exampleEn: VIP members receive preferential treatment.
The report contained a significant omission.
exampleKo: 그 보고서에는 중요한 누락(생략)이 포함되어 있었습니다.

exampleEn: The company had a rocky start this year.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 올해 장애가 많은(불안정한) 출발을 했습니다.

exampleEn: The bank increased my credit limit.
We need a trustworthy partner for this venture.
exampleKo: 이 사업을 위해서는 믿을 수 있는 파트너가 필요합니다.

exampleEn: The investigation ended inconclusively.
exampleKo: 그 조사는 결론 없이(확정적이지 않게) 끝났습니다.

exampleEn: We decided to subcontract the manufacturing.
His recollection of the event was vague.
exampleKo: 그 사건에 대한 그의 회상은 희미했습니다.

exampleEn: They are about to embark on a new project.
Security measures foiled the robbery attempt.
A down payment is required to reserve the car.
The article portrays the CEO as a visionary.
Technicians need to reinstall the software.
This is an annotated edition of the contract.
Jurors must judge the case impartially.
exampleKo: 배심원들은 사건을 공명정대하게(치우치지 않게) 판단해야 합니다.

exampleEn: Please think over the proposal before deciding.
The city will repave the damaged roads.
The dispute originated in a misunderstanding.
The hospital has an affiliation with the university.
exampleKo: 그 병원은 대학과 제휴(합병/협력) 관계를 맺고 있습니다.

exampleEn: We hired a subcontractor for the electrical work.
exampleKo: 우리는 전기 작업을 위해 하청업자를 고용했습니다.

exampleEn: That argument is beside the point.
We cannot afford to run the risk of failure.
exampleKo: 우리는 실패의 위험을 무릅쓸 여유가 없습니다.

exampleEn: A service was held in remembrance of the founder.
Binding arbitration is required by the contract.
exampleKo: 구속력 있는 중재가 계약에 의해 요구됩니다.

exampleEn: The provision applies to all employees.
